name: The Weight of the Crown
description:
This is you, a sentient crown, now king of the land. 
You look back on your rise to power:


Every head you've sat on,


Every castle floor you've scaled,


Every future subject you've possessed,

Every spine you've compressed (you're a little heavy),

Those were the times...

there's supposed to be a metaphor for responsibility somewhere here

This game was created in 48 hours for the 2021 SEA Game Jam.

Thank you very much for reading through, hope you give the game a go! Do leave a comment, any feedback is appreciated 😘 💕!

This game could not have been made possible if it weren't for my amazing teammates.

Mygnol ( Long Yee Ming ) - Gigachad Artist & Programmer
Vicposting ( Victor Gan ) - Epic Movement Programmer
Eu Wai Him - Level Dress Setting & Fresh Programmer
aagene96 ( Eugene Tam ) - Artist & Level Designer
Kaiskii ( Eng Sze Kai ) - Rojak (Designer & Programmer & sprinkle of Art)
